DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective determine safety tolerability new IV formulation versus current formulation MOA-728 focus theoretical potential infusion-related formulation-related complication .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Safety Tolerability New Intravenous Formulation MOA-728 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: A sign date informed consent form . Men nonlactating nonpregnant woman , age 18 80 year , inclusive . Women nonchildbearing potential ( WONCBP ) must surgically sterile ( hysterectomy , oophorectomy , and/or tubal ligation ) postmenopausal ³1 year . Women childbearing potential ( WOCBP ) must use acceptable nonhormonal method contraception ( intrauterine device [ IUD ] , diaphragm , condom spermicidal jelly foam , abstinence ) period least 1 month dose administration . All woman must negative pregnancy test result within 48 hour start first test article administration . Body mass index range 18 32 kg/m² body weight ≥50 kg . Healthy determine investigator basis medical history , physical examination , clinical laboratory test result , vital sign , 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) . Subjects age 65 80 year healthy , may enrol chronic illness , illness well control interfere primary objective study . Certain concomitant medication allow treatment condition list Concomitant Treatment section . Nonsmoker smoker few 10 cigarette per day determine history . Must able abstain smoke 48 hour throughout inpatient stay . Have high probability compliance completion study .
